RecitationInstruction.ab: frastuiiē. humatōbiiascā. ...] frastāiie. humatōibiiascā OD ... xᵛaxᵛiiā. uštanəm (VVrS0.7) 4045; frastuiiē. humatōibiiascā. OD stmē. aṣ̌əm. (VVrS0.8) 4162 (sec. man.).

Nerangs.ab: sidīgar bār sāzišn gōmēz ud āb xūb bē nigerišn u-š fərastuiiē bē gōwišn.
"He has to gaze a third time at the implements, gōmēz and water and to recite the fərastuiiē."

ab.ab: Revāyat of Kāmdin Šapur (var. a) (MU1, p. I. 581), on the Nērang ī Āb ud Padyāb ceremony:
(Pāz.) u. frastuiie goftan. u. humato. āv. nigarīδan.
"And he has to say frastuiie and (at) humato(ibiiascā) he has to look the water."
Revāyat of Kāmdin Šapur (var. b) (MU1, p. I. 584), on the Nērang ī Āb ud Padyāb ceremony:
"(At) fərəstuiie (he) should look the urine and the water."
Revāyat of Behdin Ǧāsā (MU1, p. I. 593), on the Nērang ī Āb ud Padyāb ceremony:
(AvPersTr.) ferastuye beguyešn gomiz benegarišn beḫᵛāneš tā (AvPersTr.) stumi ašim
"He should recite frastuiiē (and) look at the urine and utter until staōmi aṣ̌əm (VVrS0.8)."
